sections.heading: Repealed.Section 21-22G-2 - Repealed.Section 21-22G-3 - Repealed.Section 21-22G-4 - Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 2009, ch. 225, § 1; repealed by Laws 2009, ch. 225, § 6.

Repeals.— Laws 2009, ch. 225, § 6 repealed 21-22G-1 MSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 2009, ch. 225, § 1, relating to the short title, effective January 1, 2020. For provisions of the former section,seethe 2019 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 2009, ch. 225, § 2; repealed by Laws 2009, ch. 225, § 6.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 2009, ch. 225, § 3; repealed by Laws 2009, ch. 225, § 6.

Repeals.— Laws 2009, ch. 225, § 6 repealed 21-22G-3 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 2009, ch. 225, § 3, relating to primary care physician conditional tuition waiver program created, administration, rulemaking, selection process, repayment, effective January 1, 2020. For provisions of former section,seethe 2019 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.

Repeals.— Laws 2009, ch. 225, § 6 repealed 21-22G-4 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 2009, ch. 225, § 4, relating to creation of primary care physician conditional tuition waiver fund, effective January 1, 2020. For provisions of former section,seethe 2019 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
